LanguageData.VPE_WordofFear.label: word of fear
LanguageData.VPE_WordofFear.description: Induces panic by overloading their flight response system for a short duration. Considered a hostile action.
LanguageData.VPE_Liferot.label: liferot
LanguageData.VPE_Liferot.description: Psychically induces randomized mass necrosis in a target, exposing the afflicted body parts to infection and intense gagging due to the smell. Duration scales with the target’s psychic sensitivity and is an obviously overtly hostile action.
LanguageData.VPE_StealVitality.label: steal vitality
LanguageData.VPE_StealVitality.description: Siphons vitality form a close, living target, transferring the target’s natural healing factor, movement speed and consciousness to the caster. Considered an overtly hostile action.
LanguageData.VPE_ParalysisPulse.label: paralysis pulse
LanguageData.VPE_ParalysisPulse.description: Emits a cloud of black particles around the caster, which afflicts all those within the area - except the caster - with 10 days of paralytic abasia. The radius scales with the caster’s psychic sensitivity.
LanguageData.VPE_Corpsetalk.label: corpsetalk
LanguageData.VPE_Corpsetalk.description: Target a corpse and temporarily appropriate the victim’s skills to make up for the caster’s deficiencies. Effect lasts for a season before returning to normal.
LanguageData.VPE_Ghostwalk.label: ghostwalk
LanguageData.VPE_Ghostwalk.description: Psychically convinces the atoms of the caster that they are able to pass between the atoms of structures. The duration of the deceit scales with the caster’s psychic sensitivity.
LanguageData.VPE_ConsumeBodies.label: consume bodies
LanguageData.VPE_ConsumeBodies.description: Psychically strips all remaining life force from nearby humanoid corpses and stores the essence as a permanent stacking buffer to neural heat.
LanguageData.VPE_Deathshield.label: deathshield
LanguageData.VPE_Deathshield.description: Locks the touched target’s life force in place for a day, preventing them from dying. After this period, they can die from accumulated wounds, blood loss, or missing limbs or organs.
LanguageData.VPE_Enthrall.label: enthrall
LanguageData.VPE_Enthrall.description: Psychically strips the deceased target’s life force and infuses it directly into their bones, animating them for a full day. The only remaining instinct is to inflict pain on the caster’s enemies.
LanguageData.VPE_Resurrect.label: resurrect
LanguageData.VPE_Resurrect.description: By sacrificing a natural finger, the caster is able to imitate the effects of resurrector mech serum on any non-dessicated corpse, the psychic energy repairing broken-down tissues and kickstarting the body back to life. The target will be incapacitated and their allegiances will remain the same. The less preserved the body is, the more likely the target is to suffer from negative side effects.
